name: Sudoku EulMelk
description: Are you a fan of sudoku? Are you a person that loves puzzles? Well this game is a perfect puzzle game designed for you. Don't know how to play sudoku? No need to worry, because this game has a tutorial system that holds your hands and drag you up from a beginner to a professional sudoku solver with its awesome tutorial which explains the rules and also explains most of the techniques that are used to solve sudoku puzzles.
